attributes.action: close petitions.pm.gov.uk so as to stop wasting people's time at work on pointless petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently I have noticed an increase in e-mails at my place of work requesting the signing of pointless petitions that people have the mistaken belief that anyone in the government would actually bother to look at the results.  I herefor propose a petition to end the soon to be daily grind of complete faff clogging up people's inboxes.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
